FAQ

  • Q:What do you get in Sun Direct Odia Super?
    A:Sun Direct Odia Super has a total of 82 channels. It offers 40 popular channels Colors, MTV, Sony Pal, Sony SAB, STAR Gold, STAR Plus, STAR Utsav, UTV Action, UTV Movies, Zee Anmol, Zee Cinema, Movies Now, Romedy Now, Sony PIX, Aaj Tak, CNBC TV18, NDTV 24x7, Times Now, History TV18, Sony Six, Star Sports 1 Hindi, Star Sports 2, Cartoon Network, Discovery Kids, Hungama TV, Pogo, UTV Bindass, CNBC Awaaz, MTV Beats, Sony Max, Star Bharat, Zee Hindustan, Zee News, Animal Planet, Nat Geo Wild, National Geographic, Disney Channel, Disney Junior, India Today and News18 India. This pack has 82 SD channels. Explore more similar packs on Sun Direct.
  • Q:What is the Validity and Price of Sun Direct Odia Super?
    A:Sun Direct Odia Super comes with a starting price of Rs. 194 along with 28 days of validity.
  • Q:What is Sun Direct Customer Care Number?
    A:You can write an email to Sun Direct customer support at customercare@sundirect.in. Also, you can call on toll-free number 1800 123 7575.
